full_summary:
**QETE Lifting Equipment and Maintenance and Repair Tender Notice**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01021608
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-228535/A
**Publication Date:** January 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** February 7, 2023

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence requires a service provider to provide yearly maintenance and emergency services for lifting equipment, subject to security requirements. For further details, please refer to Part 1 – General Information and Part 6 – Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work includes yearly maintenance and emergency services for lifting equipment. Bidders must demonstrate their ability to provide the required services and comply with relevant security policies and directives.

**Key Tender Information:**

* **Categorization:** Procurement Category – Service Requirement (SRVTGD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding (Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria:** Not specified
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Required Documents:**
To access the tender documents, please visit the following links:

* English tender documents: [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/01c6b380d82c66824d3d51307562445b/w8486-228535_rfp_en.pdf)
* French tender documents: [2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/23c138525b5778a14c543eeae51c9be6/w8486-228535_annexe_e_fdi_fr.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries, please contact:

* Eng, Julianne
* Email: [julianne.eng@forces.gc.ca](mailto:julianne.eng@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone:
